data.message: Hi mark my name is Brenda Lee Brendalee Feenstra.named Binkley David Lee  message me telling me I won money from Some kind of Facebook thing . iSent him 350,00 To a man named Kenneth f . Aten. In Richardson Texas. Zip code75082 at some tag office. Can u tell me if I have been scamed or if its real or not. He's still trying to get my Bank information.

replies.message: Thanks for checking in with us, Brendalee. Be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. When you see stuff like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: on.fb.me/13fEkz5. -Abby
Thank u so much for letting me know what to do. I did report him as a scam.
Oh no did you send them money already or they were just asking for 350?
What up y'all yes I'm truclker now
